results.content: My main issue with the course is the lack of details on certain topics.   For instance we're shown multiple ways of performing some action.   Why are  there multiple ways?  Is one better or the standard vs others?  Other than that he did do a good job of covering the topic.

response.content: Hi Christopher Kowitz, I understood your problem, as this course is for beginners, so I have tried to cover almost ways to do things. First I have shown the simplest way to do a thing and then make the same thing using standards. So last thing you learn is proper but if you want to use the previous one then you can use it.
response.content_html: Hi Christopher Kowitz, I understood your problem, as this course is for beginners, so I have tried to cover almost ways to do things. First I have shown the simplest way to do a thing and then make the same thing using standards. So last thing you learn is proper but if you want to use the previous one then you can use it.
